               Matrix M)
Paste values of matrix M to row rowNumber of matrix.

Parameters:
rowNumber - Row number to be changed.
M - Row vector to be pasted.
Returns:
False if M is not a row vector or size of the M is bigger than the number of columns in the matrix, true o/w.
